data.title: Lemgo → Munich Hbf by Train from €53.59
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Lemgo to Munich Hbf in 6h 5m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets for Lemgo to Munich Hbf today.
data.text:
Looking to travel from Lemgo to Munich Hbf by train? You've come to the right place!

On average, it takes around 7 hours 23 minutes to travel from Lemgo to Munich Hbf by train, the fastest services can get you there in as little as 6 hours 5 minutes though. You'll usually find 22 trains per day running along the 293 miles (472 km) route between these two destinations. You’ll need to make 2 changes during the journey to Munich Hbf, as there currently aren't any direct services on this route. You'll be travelling with ICE, DB or ÖBB on your way to Munich Hbf, as these are the main rail operators on this route.

Plan your trip ahead of time and book early if you want to snap up the cheapest fares. Tickets from Lemgo to Munich Hbf start from €53.59 when you book in advance, so use our Journey Planner to view the latest prices.

If you’re feeling ready to book, start looking for cheap train tickets with us today. Keep reading for more information on the journey to Munich Hbf by train, including our timetable where you can view first and last train times.
